name: The Seventh Khan
description:
A Dark Souls Inspired game based on Persian Mythology.

Rostam, the hero of the realm, has arrived at the summit of the mountains of Mazandaran to face the White Demon who has taken the lost King Kavus as his hostage.

This game was made in 4 days for Global Game Jam 2021.

Programming & Design
Mehrdad Dehdashti

Music & Sound
Siavash Kaveh

Environment Art
Aida Nalbandabbasi

Character Art
Thuy Linh Tran
